name: DarkerRank
description: Dark mode for HackerRank designed primarily for the coding section of the site. As such, compatibility for the rest of the site is limited and will only be updated as I find necessary. However, if there is a section of the site that you feel just NEEDS to be included, please include a link and a description of what needs to be changed, and I MAY include it.
additional_info:
-5/19/2017
  • Fixed dependency on !important tag which caused some elements to be grey when they shouldn't have been
-5/18/2017
  • Restyled some of the home page (visible when NOT logged in)
  • "Orangified" the badge progress bar
  • Lightened the text on the dashboard to make it more readable.
  • Lightened the background of transparent images with black text to make them readable
-5/12/2017
  • Styled test result area for code challenges
-5/2/2017
  • Added support for code examples
  • "Orangified" the challenge filter and radio buttons
-3/2/2017
  • Fixed black-on-grey text in coding challenges.
  • Added compatibility for Domains/subdomains
